definition: Chinese peony (Paeonia lactiflora)/common herbaceous peony/peony used in TCM
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: The research aimed to establish a method for the determination of paeoniflor in Jianganle particle by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 建立健肝乐颗粒中芍药苷的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for the content determination of paeoniflorin in Gujing Pill.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立固精丸中芍药苷的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: The content of paeoniflorin in Wuling pellet was determined with HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 对五灵颗粒中芍药苷的含量进行测定。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for the determination of paeoinflorin in Fuyankang Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立妇炎康胶囊中芍药苷含量测定方法。

sentences.english: The pink flower one is "Peony" from my own collection.
sentences.chinese: 粉色的是我自己系列中的“芍药”。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a SPE-HPLC method to analyze paeoniflorin in food.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一种测定食品中芍药等含量的方法。

sentences.english: The Cladosporium red spot of peony appears mainly on the leaves and stems.
sentences.chinese: 芍药红斑病主要为害叶片和绿色茎。

sentences.english: The peony is a herbaceous perennial, while the tree peony is a deciduous shrub.
sentences.chinese: 芍药是多年生草本植物，而牡丹是落叶灌木。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effects of glycyrrhizin on intestinal absorption of paeoniflorin by the everted rat gut sac model.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究甘草酸对芍药苷大鼠肠吸收的影响。

sentences.english: All varieties to be delivered must belong to the family of Lactiflora Paeonies.
sentences.chinese: 运往荷兰的所有货品必须为多年生宿根草本芍药种类。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the technology of extracting Paeoniflorin and Puerarin from Tongqing Granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选痛清颗粒中芍药苷与葛根素的提取工艺。

sentences.english: Peony and licorice decoction had inhibiting effect on the rabbit's intestine invito.
sentences.chinese: 芍药甘草汤对家兔离体肠管呈抑制作用。

sentences.english: Consider to make clear, the root of herbaceous peony and root of herbaceous peony contain peony glucoside and have spasmolysis contraction effect.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，赤芍和白芍都含有芍药甙而有解痉挛作用。

sentences.english: HPLC method for determination of paeoniflorin in Siwu tablets was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了测定四物片中芍药苷含量的HPLC法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish an optimal extract method of paeoniflorin from Radix Paeoniae Alba with ethanol.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立白芍中芍药苷的最佳醇提工艺。

sentences.english: Result Significant effect was observed in decoction times and decoction time.
sentences.chinese: 结果煎煮次数和煎煮时间对芍药苷含量有显著影响。

definition: root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
Mudan District of Heze City 菏澤市|菏泽市[He2 ze2 Shi4], Shandong/Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Dahurian angelica (Angelica dahurica)/root of Dahurian angelica (used in TCM)
